mapper.insert: insert into mall_goods_follow SET user_id = #{userId},create_time = NOW() ,sku=#{sku}
mapper.select: select *from mall_goods t,mall_goods_follow b where t.id =b.goods_id and b.user_id =#{id}

SELECT p.sku,p.price,p.preferential_end_time ,p.preferential_price,g.* FROM mall_goods g left JOIN mall_price_and_specification p ON g.id = p.goods_id LEFT JOIN mall_goods_follow m ON m.sku=p.sku WHERE m.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT (p.sku) FROM mall_goods g left JOIN mall_price_and_specification p ON g.id = p.goods_id LEFT JOIN mall_goods_follow m ON m.sku=p.sku WHERE m.user_id=#{id}
select sku from mall_goods_follow where user_id =#{id}
select * from mall_goods_follow WHERE sku=#{sku} AND user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from mall_goods_follow where sku=#{sku} AND user_id=#{userId}
